signals.problem_statement: The AI sentiment analysis feature does not work in Hebrew, limiting its usefulness for the customer.
signals.customer_ask: To improve AI sentiment analysis to recognize Hebrew.
signals.suggested_solution: Enhance the AI to better identify emotions in local languages.
signals.context: Team size of 17, using AI sentiment analysis.

signals.problem_statement: The sentiment analysis does not accurately classify sentiments as positive or negative based on recognized keywords.
signals.customer_ask: To improve the accuracy of sentiment classification.
signals.suggested_solution: Tweak the AI to better identify sentiment patterns.
signals.context: Team size of 17, using AI sentiment analysis.
